entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is known for his love of magical creatures. He is described as grinning and having beetle-black eyes.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student at Hogwarts and is excitedly asking Hagrid about buying nifflers as pets.

entities.name: niffler
entities.description: Nifflers are magical creatures that can detect gold. They are described as wrecking houses.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts and is walking towards Hagrid with heavily bandaged hands.

entities.name: pansy parkinson
entities.description: Pansy Parkinson is watching Hermione beadily.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is a student at Hogwarts and is being warned by Hagrid not to try to steal the leprechaun gold.

entities.name: niffler (plural)
entities.description: Nifflers are described as diving back into the soil and splattering Hagrid's robes.

relationships.description: Hagrid gives Ron a reward for his successful niffler.
Hagrid is helping Hermione to count her coins.
Ron owns a niffler that has been successful in detecting gold.
Hagrid warns Goyle not to try to steal the leprechaun gold.
